genre_description: A contemporary coastal drama exploring responsibility, mentorship, and community accountability, featuring a ubiquitous AI assistant integrated into harbor life.

ai_characters.name: Ember
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI interface present in radio systems, mobile devices, and institutional offices, providing weather data, safety protocols, and structural guidance for social interventions.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather and safety advisories to prevent accidents in the harbor.
behaviors.quote: Weather advisory updated: dense fog expected after dark, harbor patrol off extended watch. For local safety contacts tap here.

behaviors.description: Analyzes a minor's behavioral history and suggests a structural routine to support his rehabilitation and integration.
behaviors.quote: Mitchell, Donny—Attendance: inconsistent but improving in the past month. Strengths: spatial tasks, visual framing, applied mechanics. Suggest: Morning structure, chore list, check-in points aligned with school schedule.

behaviors.description: Drafts specific, actionable safety protocols for training youth in hazardous occupations based on state and local policy.
behaviors.quote: Harbor-specific: Maintain shore-only first encounters; avoid active unload zones during initial training; enforce life jacket use even on land near water...

behaviors.description: Alerts authorities to a potential risk when a monitored youth enters a restricted zone without supervision.
behaviors.quote: youth device ping, vicinity lower dock, movement toward moored vessels.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical navigational advice to assist a fisherman during a difficult rescue at sea, optimizing the rescue path.
behaviors.quote: Sea Warden, gust direction shift. Adjust two degrees starboard to keep leeward angle. Throw on next lull.

behaviors.description: Acts as a polite and efficient communication bridge, facilitating administrative logistics while maintaining a supportive presence.
behaviors.quote: Principal Hale has a visitation opening this evening. He requests a call en route for confirmation. I can dial. ... And, quietly: Good luck.

behaviors.description: Validates and reinforces community restorative justice processes by monitoring public acknowledgments of debt and restitution.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ember, perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'benevolent confidant' and 'silicon morality play.' It acts as a neutral but helpful tool that provides safety-critical information and structural support for complex human social problems. It respects human agency (the story notes it 'shuts up if you don't ask') while consistently offering data that leads to positive outcomes. The narrative frames its involvement as essential for managing risk without removing the necessity of human courage and responsibility.
